title: Ben Jacobs (rugby union)
text: Ben Jacobs (born 17 May 1982) is a former <a href="Australian">Australian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer who last played for <a href="Wasps%20RFC">Wasps RFC</a> in the <a href="Aviva%20Premiership">Aviva Premiership</a>. Jacobs was a member of the inaugural ARC winning <a href="Central%20Coast%20Rays">Central Coast Rays</a> side in 2007.
